name: part_012
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・DAY1】ときのそら 8th Anniversary Party「Starry Bl∞min'」 [cB-gslGpCO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora addresses the YouTube audience, announcing the end of the free broadcast section and interacting with comments.
Tokino Sora hypes up the crowd and introduces the next song from her new album.
Instrumental intro of the next song with stage lighting effects.
End card for the free broadcast with information on how to watch the full concert.

subtitles.original: ヘイ！ハイッ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Alright!

subtitles.original: と、いうわけでですね、なんと
subtitles.english: So, as it turns out...

subtitles.original: YouTube で見てる皆さん、
subtitles.english: everyone watching on YouTube,

subtitles.original: 無料配信はここまでなんです！
subtitles.english: the free broadcast ends here!

subtitles.original: えー！？
subtitles.english: Ehhh?!

subtitles.original: 今来たばっかり？私も今来たばっかり！
subtitles.english: You just got here? I just got here too!

subtitles.original: そうだよーねー。わかるわかる。
subtitles.english: I know, right? I totally get it.

subtitles.original: えー、わかってるよー、
subtitles.english: Yeah, I know...

subtitles.original: コメントのみんなも見えてるよー。
subtitles.english: I can see everyone in the comments too.

subtitles.original: イエーイって言ってるなー。イエーイ。
subtitles.english: "Yay," they're saying. Yay!

subtitles.original: ちょっとラグってるのかもしれない。
subtitles.english: Maybe there's a bit of lag.

subtitles.original: 今来たばっかりって書いてね。よろしく。
subtitles.english: Make sure to write "I just got here." Thanks!

subtitles.original: 続きは、え、見たい人、概要欄から
subtitles.english: For the rest, if you want to watch, please check the description...

subtitles.original: 見てもらえる...
subtitles.english: ...and find it there.

subtitles.original: どこにあるのかなこれ。
subtitles.english: Where is it, exactly?

subtitles.original: どっかに概要欄のタグがあると思うんで、
subtitles.english: I think there's a description tag somewhere,

subtitles.original: そこらへんからちょっと見てもらえれば、
subtitles.english: so if you could check that out,

subtitles.original: 嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: I'd be so happy!

subtitles.original: 次の曲いっちゃおうかな？
subtitles.english: Shall we move on to the next song?

subtitles.original: まだまだ盛り上がれる？
subtitles.english: Can we get even more hyped?

subtitles.original: みんながおうちに帰ってくるの、待ってたよー！
subtitles.english: I've been waiting for everyone to come home!

subtitles.original: というわけで、次の曲は
subtitles.english: With that, the next song is...

subtitles.original: 新アルバムからこの曲で！
subtitles.english: ...this one from my new album!

subtitles.original: 冒頭無料配信はこちらで終了です。
subtitles.english: The initial free broadcast ends here.

subtitles.original: ★ライブチケット購入はコチラ >> SPWN
subtitles.english: ★ Purchase live tickets here >> SPWN
